plot: As Genosha prepares to join the UN, select members of the team head to the island nation to be honorees. Back at the mansion, a behind-the-scenes press event risks airing the X-Men's dirty laundry.

When the UN invites the mutant nation of Genosha to join its ranks, Magneto, Rogue,. and Gambit are invited to the gala. At the mansion, the rest of the team meet with a TV interviewer and Scott deals with his mixed memories of Jean and her clone.—Gislef
